Description:
Application Development: Designing, coding, and modifying PHP Laravel web applications to meet client requirements and project specifications.
Database Management: Developing and maintaining database structures, optimizing queries, and ensuring data integrity within Laravel applications.
Front-End Development: Collaborating with front-end developers and designers to integrate user interfaces into Laravel applications.
API Development: Building and consuming RESTful APIs, integrating third-party services, and managing data exchange between different systems.
Testing and Debugging: Conducting unit tests, identifying and fixing bugs and performance bottlenecks, and ensuring the quality of the developed code.Skills
Skills:
PHP and Laravel: Strong proficiency in PHP programming and hands-on experience with the Laravel framework, including Laravel MVC architecture, Eloquent ORM, and Blade templating engine.
Front-End Technologies: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and familiarity with front-end frameworks like Vue.js or React.js.
Database Management: Experience with relational databases like MySQL or PostgreSQL, including database design, optimization, and query building.
API Development: Knowledge of building and consuming RESTful APIs, authentication methods (OAuth, JWT), and integrating third-party services.
Testing and Debugging: Familiarity with unit testing frameworks (PHPUnit), debugging tools, and techniques for identifying and resolving code issues.
